statements: SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE id = 1;
SELECT version, update_url FROM firmware_updates WHERE device_id = 123;
SELECT id, version, deployed_at FROM firmware_updates WHERE update_url LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE deployed_at IS NOT NULL ORDER BY deployed_at DESC;
SELECT id, device_id FROM firmware_updates WHERE version = '1.0' AND deployed_at < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates ORDER BY deployed_at DESC;
SELECT id, version FROM firmware_updates WHERE device_id = 123456;
SELECT MAX(deployed_at) AS latest_update_date FROM firmware_updates;
SELECT version, COUNT(*) AS total_updates FROM firmware_updates GROUP BY version;
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE deployed_at IS NOT NULL ORDER BY version DESC;
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates;
SELECT version, release_date FROM firmware_updates WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM devices WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT device_id, device_name, firmware_updates.version FROM devices JOIN firmware_updates ON devices.last_update_id = firmware_updates.id;
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE version > 10 ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM devices WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung' AND device_name LIKE '%Galaxy%';
SELECT device_id, MAX(version) AS latest_version FROM firmware_updates GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT devices.device_name, firmware_updates.version FROM devices INNER JOIN firmware_updates ON devices.last_update_id = firmware_updates.id;

SELECT device_name, manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS update_count FROM devices INNER JOIN firmware_updates ON devices.last_update_id = firmware_updates.id GROUP BY device_name, manufacturer ORDER BY update_count DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_model FROM Device;
SELECT firmware_id, firmware_version FROM Firmware WHERE firmware_version LIKE 'v%';
SELECT log_id, device_id, update_timestamp FROM UpdateLog ORDER BY update_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_model FROM Device WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Firmware WHERE firmware_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM Device;
SELECT device_name, device_model FROM Device ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, firmware_version FROM Device D JOIN UpdateLog UL ON D.device_id = UL.device_id WHERE UL.status = 'Successful';
SELECT DISTINCT firmware_version FROM UpdateLog WHERE status = 'Failed';

SELECT D.device_name, F.firmware_version FROM Device D, Firmware F, UpdateLog UL WHERE D.device_id = UL.device_id AND F.firmware_id = UL.firmware_id ORDER BY D.device_name ASC, F.firmware_version DESC;
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE id = 1;
SELECT device_id, version FROM firmware_updates WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT update_data FROM firmware_updates WHERE version = 'v2.0';
SELECT * FROM devices ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE version > '1.0' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, device_id, version FROM firmware_updates WHERE device_id = 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT device_name, firmware_version FROM devices JOIN user_devices ON devices.id = user_devices.device_id WHERE user_devices.user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_devices WHERE device_id = 200);
SELECT * FROM devices LEFT JOIN firmware_updates ON devices.firmware_version = firmware_updates.version;
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates;
SELECT id, version, created_at FROM firmware_updates ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'mobile';
SELECT version FROM firmware_history WHERE update_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT id, status, last_update FROM device_status ORDER BY last_update ASC;
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates;
SELECT device_id, version, file_path FROM firmware_updates WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT id, version, file_path FROM firmware_updates WHERE version LIKE '%.0';
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'IoT';
